name: Hangman (itch) (Liki Studios)
description:
How to download Game description:

In this game, computer selects a word at random. Your Mission is to guess the word the computer selected, by placing letters, character by character, to form the word the computer selected.

This game will be good for kids, as it may help there brain get sharper, with related problems.

Fundraiser Definition

This game is a fundraiser for Liki Studios, to support it's games development. There are other hangman games available almost anywhere in different stores and devices. But with urgent need of funds, Liki Studios created this game so that your support will help us to purchase a Google play Developer account and some Studio equipment.

Info: 

if this game is oversized in your device, you can fix it by searching "display size" in your settings, and then adjust it. This setting is available only on some devices. Also, changing the display size may change your font size, but you can always change it to default.

Music and Sounds from:

https://www.zapsplat.com

Privacy:

This game does not contain any ads, it is offline, it does not collect any data, it does not sell any data and it is totally free. All we are asking for, is your support, so that we can run somethings in our studio.

Thanks for your support ♥️
